title: config
description: JSON Schema for AE Explorer configuration. Last updated with v3.1.1 release.

variables.description: an object that specifies how to map columns from the data file to the chart settings

group.title: Group
group.description: group variable name, each value of which displays in its own column in the AE table unless settings.groups is defined.

details.title: Details
details.description: an array listing each variable to display in the detail listing; if empty or unspecified, all variables in input data file will appear in detail listing

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: An array of objects specifying categorical data filters to be included with the histogram.

groups.title: Group Levels
groups.description: An array specifying which levels of settings.variables.groups will appear as columns in the table.

defaults.title: Defaults
defaults.description: an object containing default settings regarding appearance of the tables

placeholderFlag.title: Placeholder Rows Definition
placeholderFlag.description: Object to specify how to identify placeholder rows for participants with no AEs.

maxPrevalence.title: Maximum Prevelance
maxPrevalence.description: filters out any higher- and lower-level rows without at least one group rate above specified value.

maxGroups.title: Maximum Group Count
maxGroups.description: Maximum number of group levels allowed.

totalCol.title: Show Total Column?
totalCol.description: specifies whether or not to render a column showing overall rates across all groups

diffCol.title: Show Difference Column?
diffCol.description: specifies whether or not to render a column of graphical differences

prefTerms.title: Show All Preferred Terms?
prefTerms.description: specifies whether or not to initially display all lower-level rows

summarizeBy.title: Data Summary Type
summarizeBy.description: specifies whether to show participant or event rates by default

plotSettings.title: Plot Settings
plotSettings.description: Object to specify the appearance of the plots embedded in the table rows.

h.title: Height
h.description: height of the plot svg in pixels

w.title: Width
w.description: width of the plot svg in pixels

r.title: Radius
r.description: radius of the plotted points in pixels

margin.title: Dot Plot Margins
margin.description: object specifying the dot plot margins

diffMargin.title: Difference Plot Margins
diffMargin.description: object specifying the margins for the difference diamonds plot

validation.title: Show Download Link?
validation.description: adds a link to download the summarized data in a comma-separated format
